hero.title: Purchase and sale of receivables
hero.subtitle: Fast and effective solution for creditors who want to sell their receivables

mainSection.title: Purchase and sale of receivables
paragraphs: Receivable purchase is currently a popular service among all creditors. If you no longer want to deal with the receivable and don't mind losing part of your money, this service is just for you.

We specialize in purchasing receivables from both individuals and legal entities. Thanks to our high success rate, we can offer an advantageous purchase price corresponding to the current state of the receivable, and you will have nothing to do with the collection process itself.

process.title: The purchase of receivables is preceded by their verification including:

steps.title: Receivable origin history
steps.description: We thoroughly analyze the circumstances of the receivable's origin and its development over time.

steps.title: Study of related documents
steps.description: We carefully examine all documentation associated with the receivable.

steps.title: Purchase price proposal
steps.description: Based on the analysis, we propose a fair price for the receivable purchase.

process.note: We also cooperate with private executors throughout the Czech Republic, so we are able to carry out debt collection in a shortened time.

benefits.title: Why sell your receivables?
benefits.description: Selling receivables brings a number of benefits that will help you improve cash flow and focus on your core business

items.title: Immediate liquidity
items.description: You'll get funds immediately, without waiting for payment from the debtor.

items.title: No more worries
items.description: You leave all collection to us and can focus on your business.

items.title: Income certainty
items.description: You'll receive a guaranteed amount regardless of whether the receivable can be collected.

items.title: Cost savings
items.description: You don't have to invest in legal services and other costs associated with collection.
